Articles.Content:
So an obvious thing I noticed in 0.25, the monolith nearest the KSC, in Default Terrain mode, is now about 3/4ths underground (in 0.24 it was fully visible).

The other monoliths on Kerbin seem unchanged, as well as KSC2, Temple.

The Mun Easter eggs seem unchanged (well, the 6 I've been to; I haven't been to the flying saucer or southernmost monolith).

The Duna easter eggs seem unchanged; face still there, curiosity-cam visible on terrain HIGH, and the south polar pyramid still isn't emitting SSTV.

So an obvious thing I noticed in 0.25, the monolith nearest the KSC, in Default Terrain mode, is now about 3/4ths underground (in 0.24 it was fully visible).

The other monoliths on Kerbin seem unchanged, as well as KSC2, Temple.

The Mun Easter eggs seem unchanged (well, the 6 I've been to; I haven't been to the flying saucer or southernmost monolith).

The Duna easter eggs seem unchanged; face still there, curiosity-cam visible on terrain HIGH, and the south polar pyramid still isn't emitting SSTV.

Yup, I got the same results.
I have loadet my old savegame - the Tylo Cave is still underground...

so, from the above that hinted that the magic boulder around Ike may be back in 0.25 (but probably not), I'm in orbit around Ike.

Do I want to be in polar orbit? What altitude?

My assumption is that the magic boulder isn't back, but a comment above mentioned a squadcast that implied it might be back....

so, from the above that hinted that the magic boulder around Ike may be back in 0.25 (but probably not), I'm in orbit around Ike.

Do I want to be in polar orbit? What altitude?

My assumption is that the magic boulder isn't back, but a comment above mentioned a squadcast that implied it might be back....

You'll want to be in a 15kmx15km 80Ã‚Â° inclination polar orbit. Although I suggest that you land near one of the poles and scan the sky for it.
Nothing new (and only half-stock), but I'm wondering: what were the odds to have those two at the same time?
Well, the shovel is from the toolbar mod but the castle has a 1/40 chance to occur (I think).
And the toolbar easter egg also has a 1/40 chance... I wasn't sure about the castle rate. I guess that makes it a 1/1600 chance to occur?

The Update for .25 is done.

-Astronaut Complex Restrom Leftovers have been added.

Edited January 5, 2015 by MalfunctionM1Ke

Updated for .90

"Kurvy!" and Scansat-Maps to all relevant Planets/Moons have been added
Curiosity-Cam is not at (-30.3 , -26.8)... it's more like (-30.3 , -28.8)
M1ke you've done it again! Nicely done

Im actually wondering is 1.0 will fix many of teh underground or broken easter eggs. While its again not some crazy priority, itd be really neat to have stuff like the batcave and duna SSTV station back in the game, as these are all underground now.

Curiosity-Cam is not at (-30.3 , -26.8)... it's more like (-30.3 , -28.8)

Oh, must be a typo, my bad Brotoro.

Im actually wondering is 1.0 will fix many of teh underground or broken easter eggs. While its again not some crazy priority, itd be really neat to have stuff like the batcave and duna SSTV station back in the game, as these are all underground now.

I once had contact with the devs about the Eastereggs and they assured that they try to keep them alive and in good shape if their timeschedules allow it.

As 1.0 is a very "beefy" update i wouldnt put too much hope on it.
Teeny tiny Dres update
NEWS: With the new Locked Camera, you can pan underground again! This means the Duna SSTV Hill Easter Egg still lives on!
Thats great!!! *brings out SSTV decoding software *

NEWS: With the new Locked Camera, you can pan underground again! This means the Duna SSTV Hill Easter Egg still lives on!

I cant seem to find it when I pan underdroung D:

Also:

Added the Struts, ScienceBay, Telus Ladder, Small Inline Reaction Wheel to the Parts-Categorie.
Actually I had decoded the SSTV in a better resolution, so you can use it for your first post

Actually I had decoded the SSTV in a better resolution, so you can use it for your first post

http://i.imgur.com/QcjKTBW.png

Can you tell me what SSTV mode and settings were used for the Duna signal?

Actually I had decoded that thing about 1 year ago, but I think I had used Scottie 2 or Scottie DX for RX Mode but the most important thing is to turn on the Slant mode, also the program is MMSSTV 1.13A.

Also I like ''your Easter Egg'' on the Developing Duna chapter 6, I wonder if Kerbal Konstructs allow people to make not only Easter Eggs but with SSTV or projective messages like yours.

Edited May 11, 2015 by Overlocker

Actually I had decoded that thing about 1 year ago, but I think I had used Scottie 2 or Scottie DX for RX Mode but the most important thing is to turn on the Slant mode, also the program is MMSSTV 1.13A.

Also I like ''your Easter Egg'' on the Developing Duna chapter 6, I wonder if Kerbal Konstructs allow people to make not only Easter Eggs but with SSTV or projective messages like yours.

I'll talk to AlphaAsh about it, or perhaps look into it myself after I'm done with my engine mod. I'll be back onto working on the Kerbin Side stuff again, as well as a few new easter eggs to add to the ones in Kerbin Side.

I just want to confirm that the Mun sand castle shows up in 1.0.2 (this is a stock install):

You should probably update the OP, I'm pretty sure it doesn't have a 1/40 chance of occurring anymore.

Edited June 19, 2015 by Rthsom

Update: 1.04 Nothing new so far.

As for the Sandcastle.

Some people say they have never seen it in 1000 hours, some say they see it regularly.

I just leave it as is and say it is personal fortune

decided to extract the ksp sharedassets0.assets wonder if i can find the magic boulder.
